predictions.text: At the September 17, 2025 FOMC, the SEP median longer-run federal funds rate will be 2.8%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the 'longer-run' median projection equals 2.8% (midpoint terms) in the Federal Reserve's Summary of Economic Projections tables released on 2025-09-17.
monitoring_signals: Embargoed press reports detailing SEP tables
Primary dealer/WSJ previews of the longer-run dot
Fed press conference Q&A on r* and longer-run dot
predictions.rationale: The longer-run dot has been stable recently and communications suggest no near-term reassessment of neutral.

predictions.text: U.S. Industrial Production m/m (seasonally adjusted) for August 2025 will be between -0.3% and 0.2% in the Board of Governors G.17 release on 2025-09-17.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use the 'Industrial Production and Capacity Utilization (G.17)' total industrial production month-over-month percent change as published by the Federal Reserve on 2025-09-17.
monitoring_signals: ISM Manufacturing PMI and production subindex for August
Regional Fed factory surveys (Empire, Philly, Richmond)
Utility output proxies (cooling degree days), auto assemblies
predictions.rationale: Mixed factory surveys and auto production suggest a flat-to-soft print.

predictions.text: USD/MXN (Yahoo Finance: MXN=X) will close at or above 19.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Any daily 'Close' on Yahoo Finance for MXN=X at or above 19.00 before or on 2025-10-31 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Mexico tariff announcements in Diario Oficial
Banxico guidance and U.S. yields
EM FX risk sentiment (DXY, VIX)
predictions.rationale: Escalating China–Mexico trade friction and potential Fed cuts volatility can pressure MXN.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, either Joby Aviation or Archer Aviation will publicly announce completion of at least one passenger-carrying flight in the U.S. conducted under the FAA’s limited pre-certification eVTOL operations program.
predictions.verification_criteria: Official FAA communication or company press release stating a passenger-carrying flight occurred under the FAA limited operations program before or on 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: FAA program updates and advisory circulars
Joby and Archer IR/press pages
Local NOTAMs and media coverage near test sites
predictions.rationale: FAA opened a pathway and both firms are program participants, accelerating real-world demos.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, OFAC will announce at least one sanctions designation of a Mexico-based individual or entity under the Kingpin Act (SDNT/SDNTK).
predictions.verification_criteria: An OFAC press release or SDN List update adding at least one Mexico-based individual/entity with program tag SDNT or SDNTK by 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Weekly OFAC updates and FinCEN advisories
DEA/DOJ enforcement announcements
Regional security developments in Mexico
predictions.rationale: OFAC routinely updates Kingpin designations; regional dynamics increase likelihood of additions.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF Natural Gas front-month futures will settle at or above €45.00 per MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ICE Endex official daily settlement for the front-month TTF contract; any settlement ≥ €45.00/MWh by 2025-11-30 counts.
evidence: Seasonal winter risk and storage draw potential
Recent volatility in European gas benchmarks
monitoring_signals: Dutch TTF futures curve and spreads
Norwegian maintenance, LNG send-out, and weather forecasts
Geopolitical risks affecting European supply
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand, maintenance, and supply risks can briefly lift front-month settlements.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-13 close to 2025-10-31 close, Tesla (TSLA) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 5.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute pct change for TSLA and SPY using Yahoo Finance adjusted close from 2025-09-13 to 2025-10-31; TSLA return minus SPY return ≤ -5.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: Monthly EV sales/registration data
Price cuts or margin guidance from Tesla
Auto credit conditions and rates
predictions.rationale: Signals of cooling EV demand and pricing pressure weigh on high-beta auto tech.

predictions.text: The U.S. national average regular gasoline price (AAA) will reach at or above $3.90 per gallon on at least one day by 2025-10-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: AAA Gas Prices daily national average for regular unleaded shows ≥ $3.90/gal on any date on or before 2025-10-15.
evidence: Seasonal refinery maintenance and strong crude benchmarks
monitoring_signals: NYMEX RBOB futures and crack spreads
Gulf Coast refinery utilization/outages
EIA gasoline inventory and demand data
predictions.rationale: Refinery maintenance and firm crude products markets can lift retail averages into late driving season.

predictions.text: UK CPI headline year-over-year for August 2025 will be between 2.8% and 3.2%, as reported by ONS on 2025-09-18.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use the ONS Consumer price inflation statistical bulletin for August 2025; confirm the CPI (headline) 12-month rate falls within 2.8%–3.2%.
evidence: Energy base effects and services disinflation trends
monitoring_signals: ONS microdata previews via analysts
Energy and food price trackers
GBP moves and rate expectations into the print
predictions.rationale: Ongoing disinflation with volatile energy and food likely keeps headline near 3%.

predictions.text: The Boeing defense workers strike will still be ongoing on 2025-09-30 (no ratified agreement announced by that date).
predictions.verification_criteria: As of 2025-09-30 23:59 U.S. Eastern, no official union or Boeing announcement of a ratified contract ending the strike.
monitoring_signals: Union local updates and vote schedules
Boeing press releases and WARN notices
Mediation status and federal involvement
predictions.rationale: Initial rejection suggests gaps remain; defense program schedules reduce bargaining flexibility, prolonging talks.
